title: DJ Vinyl Watch Face
summary: DJ Vinyl - Animated Watch Face! Realistic look! Analog / Digital Style.
description: Features :★ Beautiful animated watch face with turntable + spinning vinyl. Choose from analog and digital version.★ 5 center vinyl options.★ 4 different, realistic vinyl styles.★ 4 different turntables.★ 3 arms.★ Mobile and wear app.★ Battery Indicator Module.★ Lots of options to choose from. Create your own style.★ Different settings for Analog and Digital Watch Face.★ More amazing improvements still to come.Dj Vinyl is a amazing Animated Watch Face with beautiful spinning vinyl. This is a perfect choice for your Android Wear Device. Realistic effect. This is the Next Level Watch Face design for Android Wear. You can create your own Vinyl style.How to use the app?- This is an app dedicated for Android Wear Devices. - Just download the app. - Wait 2-10 minutes for full installation of the package.- Open Android Wear in your smartphone and sync watch face it with the watch. - The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen.- Tap once to start animation (you can switch Tap to Start / Stop Animation to use Continuous Animation in Settings).- You can change settings on Mobile app, or drectly on your Android Wear device.If you spot something wrong please feedback me - app will be updated frequently.
descriptionHTML:
Features :
★ Beautiful animated watch face with turntable + spinning vinyl. Choose from analog and digital version.
★ 5 center vinyl options.
★ 4 different, realistic vinyl styles.
★ 4 different turntables.
★ 3 arms.
★ Mobile and wear app.
★ Battery Indicator Module.
★ Lots of options to choose from. Create your own style.
★ Different settings for Analog and Digital Watch Face.
★ More amazing improvements still to come.

Dj Vinyl is a amazing Animated Watch Face with beautiful spinning vinyl. This is a perfect choice for your Android Wear Device. Realistic effect. This is the Next Level Watch Face design for Android Wear. You can create your own Vinyl style.

How to use the app?
- This is an app dedicated for Android Wear Devices.
- Just download the app.
- Wait 2-10 minutes for full installation of the package.
- Open Android Wear in your smartphone and sync watch face it with the watch.
- The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen.
- Tap once to start animation (you can switch Tap to Start / Stop Animation to use Continuous Animation in Settings).
- You can change settings on Mobile app, or drectly on your Android Wear device.

If you spot something wrong please feedback me - app will be updated frequently.
comments: Analog shows wrong time But beautiful.
